cause_of_action: damages under section 8 of the NOC Regulations
application_details: Teva resulted from a merger between ratiopharm and Novopharm
Novopharm had benefitted from Wyeth's license agreement during ratiopharm's exclusion period
decision_reasoning: equitable doctrine of election precludes Teva from pursuing ratiopharm's claim
procedure_followed: Summary trial based on Federal Courts Rules
Legal arguments and evidence presented through affidavits and correspondence
result_of_case: Disallowing continuation of ratiopharm's section 8 claim
